post.author: 권칠환
post.content:
I have a client whose looking to fill a vacant role with a similar skill set as yours; if the job description below interests you please feel free to forward a Word version of your resume with a synopsis of your skill set


Rate: Please provide your best rate

Project Start Date: November 10, 2009 (approximate)
Project End Date: March 31, 2010
Project Duration: 100 Business Days for each Programmer/Analyst

The Client is seeking two (2) Programmer/Analysts
The Programmer/Analysts will have at least 8 years of development experience of which at least 6 years will be working experience in Java / J2EE technologies. Demonstrated experience in one or more of the following areas is also required:

Mandatory requirements
• Experience in Java/J2EE code reviews.
• Experience with different presentation and server side frameworks (i.e., Struts, Spring etc.);
• Experience with the development of common utility components;
• Experience in contributing to large, complex, IT system development and implementation projects;
• Experience in the development of distributed applications;
• Experience with Java Message Service (JMS), Java EE Connector Architecture, and transaction management;
• Web development experience, including HTML, Javascript, AJAX;
• Demonstrated experience with a wide range of Open Source Java Libraries (Jasper Reports, iText etc,);
• Experience with object oriented analysis and design;
• Experience with Oracle SQL and PL/SQL;
• Familiarity with additional Java technologies such as Velocity, Quartz, Jakarta Commons, log4j, Java mail API, XMLBeans, PMD, etc;
• Demonstrated experience with encryption/crypto APIs;
• Excellent analytical, problem solving and decision making skills; excellent English language verbal and written communication skills; excellent interpersonal and negotiation skills; and
• A team player with a track record for meeting deadlines.


Desirable attributes:
• Experience within the OPS in projects of a similar nature; and
• Experience with Web Services, SOAP, MQ-Series, XML, XSL/XLST, Schemas is a plus.



If you know of someone who would be interested in this role, feel free to forward the job description and my contact information


Best Regards,


Arshiya Gopalani
Recruitment Consultant
+ arshiya@nexstaf.com

post.title: Java Developer- Contract- Downtown
